#id=1
#text=I returned to my home one evening after a long day of hiking and exploring the outdoors .
#id=2
#text=I had dirt caked on my legs and grass stains on my knees , so I needed to clean myself up before getting into bed .
#id=3
#text=I got a towel and washcloth from my linen closet and brought them into my bathroom .
#id=4
#text=I turned on both the hot and cold knobs in the bathtub and let the water run for a few moments before I put my hand under it to test the temperature .
#id=5
#text=I turned each knob until the water felt warm and comfortable .
#id=6
#text=Then I plugged the drain and undressed , putting my dirty clothes in the hamper .
#id=7
#text=Once the bathtub was about halfway full , I turned off the water and carefully sat down in the tub .
#id=8
#text=I took some soap from the dish and rubbed it on the washcloth , then scrubbed my dirty legs until the mud and grass disappeared .
#id=9
#text=I let the water rinse away the soap .
#text=Once I felt clean , I stepped out of the tub and wrapped a towel around myself to dry off .
#text=Then I pulled the plug out of the drain and let the water disappear down the pipes .
#text=As the tub was draining , I dried myself completely with the towel and put on pajamas .
#text=I hung up my wet towel and washcloth and was ready to go to bed , all clean from the bath .
